description:
Classic Blundstone Boots, they get better looking the more you wear them. But more than just looking fine, these boots use a patented shock protection system that ensures you stride comfortably with minimal impact to your joints. Simple pull-on style and ergonomic shape provides a snug fit without laces.

  • Uppers are weatherproof leather, seamlessly fused to the sole for resilient construction
  • SPS reduces skeletal stress by absorbing and dispersing shock. Foot strike shock is reduced by 33%
  • Pull loops for extra leverage
  • Thermo-polyurethane sole is highly abrasion resistant and provides exceptional traction
  • Round toe, medium width
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone Original 510 Boots - Unisex
